RelatedSentence: Johannesburg - A teenager appeared in the Mokopane Magistrate 's Court on Monday in connection with the murder of a farm couple , Limpopo police said .
The matter was postponed to 5 June for further investigation , said spokesperson Ronel Otto .
The teenager chose not to apply for bail at his last appearance .
The teenager chose not to apply for bail at his last appearance .
He is being kept in a place of safety , Otto said .
Police said the matter was transferred to Mokopane because the bodies of the couple were discovered on their farm near Lephalale in Limpopo .
Police found the bodies of the 69 - year - old man and 66 - year - old woman after their relatives had been unable to contact them .
